nodes.text: Leia was a 14-year-old princess, the spoiled daughter of King Kayos and Queen Breha of Aquilae. She had two brothers, Biggs and Windy.
Leia prepared to leave Aquilae. Biggs and Windy discovered this and informed their father, Kayos, about Leia's departure and urged him to say goodbye to her.

When the planet falls under attack by the Galactic Empire, Leia is rescued by young Jedi-Bendu Padawan Annikin Starkiller. At first, they don't get along and argue at first, but despite their harsh beginnings, they eventually fall in love.
After her father's death, she becomes the new queen of Aquilae.
